description:
For over 40 years, Emircom has been a leading provider of ICT solutions in the UAE and KSA, delivering unparalleled expertise, innovation, and results to a wide range of customers. With a team of highly qualified professionals and a powerful vision, Emircom is a company that sets the standards for excellence in the industry.

Our customer base is diverse, encompassing service providers, governments, educational institutions, finance companies, and healthcare organizations. We understand that each customer has unique needs and requirements, so we strive to tailor our services to meet those needs.

To deliver the highest quality solutions, we partner with the best in the business. Our strategic partnerships with companies like Cisco, Dell, Fortinet, Palo Alto, Lenovo, Schneider, and many others demonstrate our commitment to providing the most innovative and reliable technology solutions. As a Gold Certified Partner of Cisco, a Titanium Partner of Dell, and a Premier Partner of VMware, we have the resources and expertise to bring the latest technology to our customers.

Our portfolio of services is comprehensive and designed to meet the needs of organizations of all sizes and types. We offer managed IT services to ensure that your systems run smoothly and efficiently, system integration and migration services to help you move to new technologies, project management and training services to ensure your team is equipped to use new technologies effectively, and much more. We also provide assessment, audit, and optimization services to help you identify areas for improvement, application, and migration support to ensure your transition to new technologies is smooth, maintenance and support services to keep your systems running, and IT automation and app development services to help you stay ahead of the curve.

In short, at Emircom, we are dedicated to helping you achieve your goals by providing the best ICT solutions and services possible.

ğŸ¯ "I never said no to any task because I wanted to learn". From sales to logistics to project delivery, M. Abou-Zaki embraced every opportunity. He studied certifications like university coursework, even delivered equipment personally to meet customer commitments.
ğŸ¤ Trust became his competitive advantage. When a customer sent an inflated purchase order, he corrected it downward. That transparency built 20+ year partnerships. "You need to build your sales around trust," he explains.
ğŸ’ª Loyalty over opportunism "Once I select a vendor for a solution, either I win with them or lose with them. I will not change vendors mid-process, even if I lose the business." This unwavering commitment earned Cisco partnerships spanning 25 years.
